`,(0,e.jsx)(u,{name:"markdown-to-slate-demo",__dependencies__:'["remark-emoji","@platejs/basic-styles","@platejs/basic-nodes","@platejs/callout","@platejs/emoji","@emoji-mart/data@1.2.1","@radix-ui/react-popover","@radix-ui/react-toolbar","@radix-ui/react-tooltip","@radix-ui/react-separator","@radix-ui/react-dropdown-menu","@platejs/code-block","lowlight","cmdk","@radix-ui/react-dialog","@radix-ui/react-slot","@platejs/code-drawing","@radix-ui/react-select","@platejs/layout","@udecode/cn","@platejs/resizable","@platejs/comment","@platejs/date","react-day-picker@8.10.1","date-fns","@platejs/link","@platejs/list","@radix-ui/react-checkbox","@platejs/indent","@platejs/math","react-textarea-autosize","@platejs/media","@platejs/caption","react-player@3.3.1","react-lite-youtube-embed","@platejs/mention","@platejs/combobox","@ariakit/react","@platejs/suggestion","@radix-ui/react-avatar","@platejs/table","@platejs/selection","tailwind-scrollbar-hide","lodash","@platejs/toc","@platejs/toggle","@platejs/markdown","remark-gfm","remark-math","@platejs/ai","ai@5.0.28","@faker-js/faker","@ai-sdk/react@2.0.28","dedent@1.0.0","@platejs/autoformat","@radix-ui/react-context-menu","@platejs/dnd","react-dnd","react-dnd-html5-backend","@platejs/docx","@platejs/juice","@platejs/excalidraw","@excalidraw/excalidraw","use-file-picker@2.1.2","sonner","@radix-ui/react-alert-dialog","html2canvas-pro","pdf-lib","lucide-react","@platejs/floating","react-tweet","uploadthing@7.7.4","@uploadthing/react@7.3.3","zod","@platejs/slash-command"]',__item__:`{"name":"markdown-to-slate-demo","type":"registry:example","dependencies":["remark-emoji"],"registryDependencies":["editor-kit","use-debounce"],"files":[{"path":"markdown-to-slate-demo.tsx","content":"'use client';\\n\\nimport * as React from 'react';\\n\\nimport { MarkdownPlugin, remarkMdx, remarkMention } from '@platejs/markdown';\\nimport { Plate, usePlateEditor } from 'platejs/react';\\nimport remarkEmoji from 'remark-emoji';\\nimport remarkGfm from 'remark-gfm';\\nimport remarkMath from 'remark-math';\\n\\nimport { EditorKit } from '@/components/editor/editor-kit';\\nimport { useDebounce } from '@/hooks/use-debounce';\\nimport { Editor, EditorContainer } from '@/components/ui/editor';\\n\\nconst initialMarkdown = \`## Basic Markdown\\n\\n> The following node and marks is supported by the Markdown standard.\\n\\nFormat text with **bold**, _italic_, _**combined styles**_, ~~strikethrough~~, \\\\\`code\\\\\` formatting, and [hyperlinks](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hypertext).\\n\\n\\\\\`\\\\\`\\\\\`javascript\\n// Use code blocks to showcase code snippets\\nfunction greet() {\\n console.info(\\"Hello World!\\")\\n}\\n\\\\\`\\\\\`\\\\\`\\n\\n- Simple lists for organizing content\\n\\n1. Numbered lists for sequential steps\\n\\n| **Plugin** | **Element** | **Inline** | **Void** |\\n| ----------- | ----------- | ---------- | -------- |\\n| **Heading** | | | No |\\n| **Image** | Yes | No | Yes |\\n| **Mention** | Yes | Yes | Yes |\\n\\n![](https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1712688930249-98e1963af7bd?q=80&w=2070&auto=format&fit=crop&ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D)\\n\\n- [x] Completed tasks\\n\\n- [ ] Pending tasks\\n\\n---\\n\\n## Advanced Features\\n\\n\\nThe following node and marks are not supported in Markdown but can be serialized and deserialized using MDX or specialized UnifiedJS plugins.\\n\\n\\nAdvanced marks: \u2318 + B,underlined, highlighted text, colored text and background highlights for visual emphasis.\\n\\nSuperscript like E=mc2 and subscript like H2O demonstrate mathematical and chemical notation capabilities.\\n\\nAdd mentions like [Aayla Sxecura](mention:mention_id) 12312\\n\\n\\n, dates (2025-05-08), and math formulas ($E=mc^2$).\\n\\nThe table of contents feature automatically generates document structure for easy navigation.\\n\\n\\n\\nMath formula support makes displaying complex mathematical expressions simple.\\n\\n$$\\n\\\\\\\\frac{-b \\\\\\\\pm \\\\\\\\sqrt{b^2 - 4ac}}{2a}\\n$$\\n\\nMulti-column layout features enable richer page designs and content layouts.\\n\\n\\n\\nleft\\n\\n\\n \\n right\\n \\n\\n\\nPDF embedding makes document referencing simple and intuitive.\\n\\n\\nAudio players can be embedded directly into documents, supporting online audio resources.\\n

description: 将 Plate 内容转换为 Markdown，反之亦然。
title: Markdown
